Package game.items

Class Rune

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
game.items.Rune
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable, Consumable, Resettable
public class Rune extends Item implements Consumable, Resettable
A class representing a Rune item that can be consumed by actors to increase their balance. Runes are consumable items that, when consumed, increase the actor's balance and remove them from the actor's inventory. Created by:

      Retrieves the list of allowable actions for the owner actor when interacting with this Rune item
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class Item
      Parameters:
      owner - The actor interacting with the Rune
      Returns:
      An ActionList containing the ConsumeAction for consuming this Rune.

    • consume

      public String consume(Actor owner)
      Consumes the Rune, increasing the actor's balance by the specified value and removing it from the actor's inventory
      Specified by:
      consume in interface Consumable
      Parameters:
      owner - The actor consuming the Rune
      Returns:
      A message indicating that the actor has consumed the Rune

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Provides a way for all the runes to wiped off when it is on the ground except the runes dropped by the Player after player dies due to any causes and triggers the game reset
      Specified by:
      reset in interface Resettable
